tool_description: Fetches historical market data including prices, volumes, and basic market statistics for specified securities over a given time period.

symbols.description: Array of ticker symbols to retrieve data for

start_date.description: Start date for data retrieval (ISO 8601 format)

end_date.description: End date for data retrieval (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid symbol: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized. Verify symbol format and availability.
Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date, and both must use ISO 8601 format.
Frequency error: Use supported frequency values: daily, weekly, or monthly.
Data limit exceeded: Request exceeds maximum of 100 symbols. Reduce the number of symbols.
Market closed: No data available for requested dates due to market closures or holidays.
usage: Provide an array of symbols and date range to retrieve historical market data. Optionally specify frequency for data granularity.

timestamps.description: Array of timestamps for the data points

prices.description: 2D array where each sub-array contains prices for one symbol across all timestamps

data_quality_score.description: Quality score from 0-1 indicating data completeness
